thread.title_full: Cheryl's Trust opens new centre in Newcastle | Daily Mail Online

author: Rebecca Lawrence For Mailonline
title: Cheryl's Trust opens new centre in Newcastle | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Royally good nices: Cheryl (pictured with Prince Charles) set up Cheryl's Trust to help young people, together with The Prince's Trust the charity will open a safe space in the summer 'And for your continued love and support, I am eternally grateful. Here's to changing lives. I love you.' She added in a later statement: 'I am incredibly proud to call Newcastle my hometown and itâ€™s important to me to be able to do my bit to help the young people in the area. 'No young person should be held back by their circumstances, this new centre will transform thousands of young lives by teaching skills, developing confidence and moving young people into education, work or training.' Excited: Cheryl - who has been keeping a low-profile on social media since refusing to confirm her pregnancy - took to Instagram and Twitter to share a statement The news will no doubt be another boost for Cheryl - who is said to be expecting her first child with boyfriend Liam Payne, 23. Cheryl and her beau have kept silent on social media, with the former X Factor judge steering clear of Instagram for six weeks until she posted about her charity. The post come after Liam jetted back from working on his new album in Los Angeles ahead of the birth of his first child, sending gossips into overdrive. Keeping their Twitter and Instagram profiles in a state of lock-down, the pair have not deigned to address the rumours. Proud parents to be: The news will no doubt be another boost for Cheryl - who is said to be expecting her first child with boyfriend Liam Payne, 23 Share or comment on this article 185
